creator: stebbi@decode.is
text:
I have (had) a classpath entry which contained spaces (like for example when 
you install JAXP on your computer it is put into 'x:\Program 
Files\JavaSoft\JAXP1.0.1' or something like that).  Having one or more spaces 
in your system environment CLASSPATH variable messes something up with Ant and 
you will not be able to run it.
This is fixed in 1.4 alpha. If you would like you can try a nightly build.
creator: conor@apache.org
